metadata.title: CVE-2022-24735 redis: Code injection via Lua script execution environment (low)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in the Redis database where Lua scripts can be manipulated to overcome ACL rules. This flaw allows an attacker with access to Redis to inject Lua code that executes the potentially higher privileges of another Redis user. 
            
            MITIGATION: If Lua scripting is not being used, this vulnerability can be mitigated by blocking access to SCRIPT LOAD and EVAL commands using ACL rules.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
redis is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
